About UCU

First community college in the Philippines founded in 1966 by Dr. Pedro T. Orata. Home of the great achievers and competitive learners. A university that offers high quality education with affordable tuition fee. Now with 12,500 (2015) students enrolled.

Copyright © 2019 Urdaneta City University.
